mapper.select: SELECT SUM(vr.`volunteer_time`) FROM t_volunteer_record vr WHERE vr.`user_id` = #{userId} AND vr.`status` = "1"

SELECT DISTINCT a.id AS activityId FROM t_activity a LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON aa.`activity_id` = a.`id` WHERE aa.`id` IN ( SELECT vr.`activity_assignment_id` FROM t_volunteer_record vr LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON vr.`activity_assignment_id` = aa.`id` WHERE vr.`user_id` = #{userId} AND aa.`del_flag` = 0 ) AND aa.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT aa.id AS activityAssignmentId FROM t_activity_assignment aa LEFT JOIN t_volunteer_record vr ON vr.`activity_assignment_id` = aa.`id` WHERE aa.`activity_id` = #{activityId} AND vr.`user_id`=#{userId} AND aa.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT SUM(vr.`volunteer_time`) AS activityTotalTime FROM t_activity_assignment aa LEFT JOIN t_volunteer_record vr ON vr.`activity_assignment_id` = aa.`id` WHERE aa.`activity_id` = #{activityId} AND vr.`user_id`=#{userId} AND vr.`status` = '1' AND aa.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT vr.`user_id` AS userId ,u.name AS userName,d.`name`AS departmentName,SUM(vr.`volunteer_time`) AS userVolunteerTimes,COUNT(vr.`status`) AS userParticipateInActivityNum FROM t_volunteer_record vr RIGHT JOIN t_user u ON u.id = vr.`user_id` LEFT JOIN t_department d ON d.id = u.`department_id` WHERE vr.`status` = '1'
AND d.`id` = #{departmentId}
AND d.`del_flag` = 0 GROUP BY(vr.`user_id`) ORDER BY
userParticipateInActivityNum DESC
userVolunteerTimes DESC,userName ASC
LIMIT 10
